landingPage.intro: We think that budgeting is something everyone should do. However, many might see budgeting as a “must-do”-thing that too often gets avoided. I believe that I can help a lot of people in getting started with simple budgeting. Its visual representations will make budgeting more easy and more fun!
landingPage.features.1.description: To successfully manage your finance, you need to learn from history. We are here for exactly that purpose: Learn your financial history! (And do it right!)
landingPage.features.2.description: You give your transactions, we visualize it, simple as that. Nothing is stored/sent/exchanged anywhere outside of your web browser storage. We are a strong believer of complete privacy, and we believe everyone deserve that.
landingPage.features.3.description: We speak your local lanaguges. So far, only English is supported. We are simply that international
